metadata.title: CVE-2022-48624 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
close_altfile in filename.c in less before 606 omits shell_quote calls forLESSCLOSE.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-48624` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

less - 481-2.1ubuntu0.2+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: less package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '481-2.1ubuntu0.2+esm1').
